query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pacientes) as total_pacientes,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM atendimentos) as total_atendimentos,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user) as total_usuarios,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_credentials) as usuarios_com_login,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM audit_log) as registros_auditoria,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_sessions) as sessoes_ativas;
